entry.title: $1746 // 2BR/1B Available for Immediate Move In!!
entry.content:
Call Us Today! show contact info

PROPERTY DESCRIPTION

Located 1 mile from exciting downtown Stamford! Enjoy the comfort and privacy of townhouse-living, in tranquil Westover, with modern amenities. Entertain guests on your private back deck (a rare find this close to Downtown!).

Right Around the Corner, Near Everywhere You Want to Be.

UNIT FEATURES
Central Air Conditioning
Refrigerator
Abundant windows
Disposal
Individual Climate Control
Washer/Dryer
Designer kitchen cabinetry & countertops
Dishwasher
Eat-in kitchens

PROPERTY AMENITIES
Fully-equipped fitness center
24-Hour Availability
Along the Stamford city bus line
Central laundry facility
Near Public Transit
Near the Stamford train station
Minutes to downtown Stamford
Community social events
Playground
Districted to Westover elementary school
Professional landscaping
Minutes from I-95 & Merritt Parkway
Licensed Day Care Center on-site
Parking
On-site Management
Private club room

LEASE TERMS
12-Months

PARKING:
Type - Surface Lot

PET POLICY:
Cats and dogs are allowed.
$500 Refundable security deposit required for each pet

OFFICE HOURS
Monday: 9:00A to 6:00P
Tuesday: 9:00A to 7:00P
Wednesday: 9:00A to 6:00P
Thursday: 9:00A to 7:00P
Friday: 9:00A to 6:00P
Saturday: 10:00A to 2:00P

MANAGEMENT COMPANY:
Richman Property Services
Call Us Today! show contact info
Equal Housing Opportunity
